title: Minced beef and pork pie
ingredients: ['1 potato, peeled and cubed', '225g minced pork', '225g minced beef', '1/2 large onion, chopped', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '4 tablespoons water', '3 sprigs fresh thyme, chopped', '3 sprigs fresh sage, chopped', '1/2 teaspoon mustard powder', '1/4 teaspoon ground cloves', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 sheets shortcrust pastry']
